## Required:

- Lecture Notes on Hierarchical Modeling by Peter D. Hoff.:
    + Section 4: Bayesian estimation
    
- [A First Course in Bayesian Statistical Methods](https://find.library.duke.edu/catalog/DUKE004968562) by Peter D. Hoff.:

    + Section 8.3: The hierarchical normal model

    + Section 5.3: Fully Bayesian analysis of conjugate hierarchical models
